texts.fr: Julienne vit à Avédji et est âgée de 41 ans. Julienne est une femme mariée et habite avec ses trois enfants. Pour mieux subvenir aux besoins de la famille, Julienne vend des éponges en lin et en fer. Ce commerce lui permet d’avoir un revenu pouvant aider son mari dans les charges quotidiennes. Julienne s’approvisionne deux  fois par mois pour avoir ses articles. Julienne demande ce prêt pour acheter les catégories d’éponges afin de réaliser son bénéfice pour subvenir aux besoins de son enfant.
texts.en: Julienne is 41 years old and lives in Avédji. She is a married woman who lives with her three children. In order to better meet her family's needs, Julienne sells linen sponges and scouring pads. This business allows her to earn an income which assists her husband with their daily expenses. Julienne purchases sponge supplies twice per month. She is requesting this loan to purchase various sponges so she can earn enough profit to meet her child's needs.

loans.use: to purchase 60 sponges

loans.name: Tobiko

texts.en:
Tobiko is 42 years old. He is married with four children. He has had his farming business for 10 years. He will be using the loan to purchase fertilizer and chemicals and hopes this will help him to enlarge the business. 

His hopes and dreams for the future are to be able to educate his children and live a better life.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and chemicals

loans.name: Regina

texts.en: Regina is from Ronda, Cebu. She is 41 years old and married with three children, ages six, ten and eleven. Regina is engaged in food vending in her community. She sells food such as noodles, sauteed vegetables and fried fish, pork stew and soups. This is her means to provide for her children. She is asking for a loan to buy more ingredients such as flour, sugar and meat. A loan will help Regina to continue working for her business, maximizing her income. In the future, she hopes to expand and improve her business location for more success.

loans.use: to buy rice, flour, sugar and meat

loans.name: Mujeres Valientes Group

texts.es:
El comité se denomina MUJERES VALIENTES, es un grupo con 12 integrantes se encuentran en el 1er ciclo y demuestran entusiasmo por formar parte del programa de comités. Ellas son de una zona rural aun en crecimiento, donde todas se dedican a actividades de cría de animales. 
La Sra. Felipa es muy emprendedora y sus actividades se basan en el cultivo y la cría de animales, ella comenta que por medio de su trabajo tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de animales para la cría, como ser gallinas, cerdos y otros, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder crecer.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called MUJERES VALIENTES.  It is a group with 12 members, currently in its first loan cycle, and enthusiastic to be a park of the community bank program.  They are from a rural area that is still developing, where everyone is dedicated to raising animals.  

Ms. Felipa is very enterprising and her activities are based on cultivation and the raising of animals.  She mentions that through her work she has the means to be able to help her family and loved ones.  She is requesting this loan to buy animals to raise, such as chickens, pigs, and others, so that she can continue her work.  She is thankful for the opportunity to be able to grow.

loans.use: to buy animals to raise, such as chickens, pigs and others.

loans.name: San Antonio De Padua Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Antonio de Padua es de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde por medio de este programa podrán luchar y esforzarse para poder crecer y salir adelante.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Sunilda, quien se dedica a la costura, es una persona muy trabajadora que con sacrificio se ha puesto como meta mejorar para poder ayudar a su familia. Ella es una mujer muy dedicada a sus seres queridos y es por ellos que quiere seguir creciendo y mejorando.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar telas, hilos, gomas, botones, cierres y otros, y de esa forma poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradecen todas por la oportunidad que reciben de poder seguir con su trabajo y ayudando a sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
The group called San Antonio de Padua is from the city of Coronel Oviedo. They are part of the Elimination of Poverty program, in which they are able to fight and exert themselves to grow and move forward. 

One of these member is Sunilda, who makes a living as a seamstress. She is a hardworking person who, with much sacrifice, has set as a goal improving herself so that she can help her family. Sunilda is a very woman who is very dedicated to her loved ones. It is for them that she wants to continue growing and improving. Sunilda is requesting this loan in order to buy fabric, thread, rubber bands, buttons, fasteners, and other items. This will help her to continue her work. 

The group is grateful to everyone for the opportunity they have received to continue their work and help their loved ones.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, rubber bands, fasteners, and other items.

loans.name: Eulalio

texts.es:
Eulalio es electricista, está casado y comenta que su esposa tiene una despensa, es una persona muy trabajadora que esta esforzándose para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y poder ayudar a su familia por medio de su trabajo. Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en poder comprar insumos para su casa y ayudar a sus seres queridos.
Pide hoy nuevamente este préstamo para poder ayudar a su esposa y comprar insumos para la venta en el negocio, como ser verduras, carne, panificados, y otros, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Eulalio is an electrician. He is married and comments that his wife runs a small store. Eulalio is a hardworking person who is exerting himself in order to improve his circumstances and be able to help his family through his work. He mentions that he used his previous loan to buy supplies for his home and to help his loved ones. 

Today, Eulalio is requesting a new loan to help him support his spouse and buy supplies for her to sell in her business. These will include vegetables, meat, baked goods, and other items. In this way, they will be able to continue working as they have been doing.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, baked goods, and other items.

loans.name: Everlyne

texts.en:
Everlyne has been doing mixed farming for the past eight years, and she has grown her farm business tremendously. She was raised in the Nyamira area of Kenya, where she now lives with her husband and 8, and conducts her business.

Currently, she is trying to gather capital to secure more land to cultivate. This would enable her to produce more food that will give her family decent diets and better income.

She loves to feed people, and that is why she finds her business fulfilling. Your loan will help her elevate her livelihood, by producing more food for her family and others in the community.

loans.use: to pay for land

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth has been doing mixed farming for the past 35 years, and she has grown her farm business tremendously. She was raised in the Nandi Hills area of Kenya. She lives there with her husband and eight children, and conducts her business there.

Currently, she is trying to gather capital to secure more land to cultivate. This would enable her to produce more food that will give her family decent diets and a better income.

She loves to feed people, and that is why she finds her business fulfilling. Your loan will help her elevate her livelihood, by producing more food for her family and others in the community.

loans.use: to secure rental land.

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es:
Veinte años arreglando ropa, creando prendas de tela que se convirtieron en la imagen de una bailarina, de una novia de bodas o de una quinceañera, han sido los mejores de María para sacar adelante a sus ocho hijos, que ahora trabajan en lo que estudiaron y que la apoyan en todo momento como costurera. A sus 65 años de edad ha trabajado como cocinera de pequeña, para luego independizarse como costurera y tener su negocio propio con el talento con que nació.  
María cuenta con un empleo estable y con una familia incondicional. Sin embargo, su salud no está totalmente protegida con el hecho que no posee un servicio higiénico de calidad. Por esta razón, ella considera que ya es hora para solicitar un préstamo para construir un baño, comprar tubería, inodoro, ducha, azulejos, entre otros materiales de construcción para cumplir con este sueño que le permitirá mejorara su calidad de vida y no sufrir por su seguridad personal. En sus planes está hacer crecer su taller de costura y completar las mejoras de su hogar.
texts.en:
Twenty years of fixing clothes, creating garments from fabric that become the image of a ballet dancer, a bride, or for a ‘quinceañera’ [celebration of a girl’s 15th birthday] have been the best for María to get her eight children ahead.  They are now in school, and she supports them always as a seamstress.  She is 65 years old, and she had worked as a cook since she was little.  She later became an independent seamstress with her own business using the talent she was born with.

María has a stable job and an unconditional family.  However, her health is not totally protected because she does not have quality sanitary facilities.  That is the reason that she feels it is time to request a loan to build a bathroom.  She will buy pipes, a toilet, a shower, and tile, among other construction materials to fulfill this dream.  It will allow her to improve her quality of life and to not suffer because of her personal safety.

Her plans are to make her seamstress shop grow and to complete improvements on her home.

loans.use: to buy pipes, a toilet, a shower, and tile, among other construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a larger facility in which to produce her baked goods.

loans.name: Dayton Antonio

texts.es:
Al entrar a la casa de Dayton, miras la humildad en la que vive este hombre de 39 años de edad, que desde hace 19 años trabaja en el sistema penitenciario como jefe de sección. A pesar de haber estudiado diseño e informática, este padre soltero alista todas las noches su uniforme para ir a trabajar el día siguiente en el penitenciario.
Dayton es hombre luchador que ha sido padre y madre de un adolescente de 14 años de edad, que le ha podido brindar educación, alimentación y techo con mucho amor. Para él su hijo es lo más importante de su vida, por lo que solicita un préstamo para comprar inodoro, lavamanos, tubería, bloques, azulejos, entre otros materiales de construcción para instalar el servicio higiénico y mejorar la calidad de vida de él y de su pequeño. Su sueño es ver graduado a su hijo, continuar con la construcción de su casa, terminar él sus estudios y dedicarse a su profesión.
texts.en: When you enter Dayton's house, you see the humble surroundings this 39-year-old man lives in. Since the age of 19 he has worked in the penitentiary system as a section head. In spite of having studied design and computer programming, every evening, this single father readies his uniform to go to work the next day in the penitentiary.  Dayton is a determined man who has been father and mother to a 14-year-old adolescent to whom he has been able to provide education, food and a roof with much love. His son is the most important thing in his life and for this reason he is asking for a loan to buy a toilet, lavatory sink, pipe, cement block, tiles and other construction materials to install sanitary facilities and to improve the quality of life of his child and himself. His dream is to see his son graduate, to continue with the construction of his house, to finish his own studies and dedicate himself to his chosen profession.

loans.use: to buy a toilet, lavatory, pipe, cement blocks, tile and other items.

loans.name: Kellen

texts.en:
Kellen is a responsible and diligent smallholder farmer from Magumoni village who is involved in dairy, poultry, goat and tree farming. Her work brings home an important source of income. She is married and has four children who help her with the work. 

Kellen is seeking a loan to construct a cowshed. With your loan investment, her four dairy cows will be housed to protect them from harsh weather conditions, such as extreme heat, and for easier management of the herd. This intervention will result in improved health and dairy management, both keys to having a highly productive dairy farm. 

Income resulting from this intervention will be used to clear loan repayments and meet Kellen’s family’s basic needs and wants.

loans.use: to construct a cowshed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, beans, potatoes, vegetables, shortening, paper, and cabbage, etc.

loans.name: Jose David

texts.es: José tiene 34 años de edad habita en vivienda propia, él es un hombre muy trabajador que se gana la vida prestando sus servicios como motorista ya que es su fuente de ingresos para ir sobreviviendo, José desea reparar algunos repuestos de su vehículo el cual hace sus viajes ya que es muy necesario cambiar algún desperfecto mecánico ya que todos los días se transporta de un lugar a otro, y así poder andar seguro. José solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cambio de llantas, y mano de obra para la reparación de su vehículo ya que es su fuente de ingreso.
texts.en: 34-year-old José lives in his own home. He is a hardworking man who earns his living by working as a driver. As he relies on this source of income to get by, he wants to have some repairs done to the van he uses for his business. It is vital that he sort out any mechanical problems because he travels around in his vehicle every day and he wants to do this safely. José has applied to FUSAI for a loan which he will use to buy new tyres and pay for repairs to his vehicle as he needs it to earn his living.

loans.use: to invest in new tyres and repairs to his vehicle which he needs to earn his living.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase items for the salon

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy animals to raise such as chickens, pigs, goats and other animals.

loans.name: Flor De Maria

texts.es:
La felicidad que se refleja en los ojos de Flor es motivante, sin embargo, escucharla hablar de lo orgullosa que está por su trabajo y por sus hijos es aún más inspirador. A sus sesenta años de edad, esta madre soltera lleva más de 31 años con su tienda de venta de ropa, la cual señala de ser la fuente que la ha ayudado salir adelante. La última vez que invirtió en su tienda, pudo comprar ropa para niños y adultos, trayendo consigo grandes ganancias. Razón por la que agradece a todas las personas que la apoyaron con ese crédito que la ayudó a restaurarse y seguir adelante. 
Ahora esta emprendedora desea seguir invirtiendo, por lo que solicita un nuevo préstamo para comprar ropa, principalmente camisas, faldas, pantalones y vestidos de mujer, de manera que pueda seguir haciendo crecer su tienda y sus ingresos. Afortunadamente cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos, por lo que eso le da fortaleza para seguir con pasos firmes. Al cancelar desea seguir mejorando su tienda, pues desea tener siempre esos ingresos seguros después de su jubilación.
texts.en:
The happiness reflected in Flor's eyes is motivating, however, listening to her talk about how proud she is of her business and her children is even more inspiring. At 60 years old, this single mother is running her store for the 31st year. This business has been what has helped her to get ahead. The last time that she invested in her store, she was able to buy clothing for children and adults, which brought on large profits. For this reason, she is grateful to all of the people that supported her with this loan, which helped her to restore herself and keep moving forward. 

Now, this entrepreneur hopes to keep investing. This is why she is requesting another loan. She will buy clothing, principally blouses, skirts,  camisas, faldas, pants, and women's dresses. In this way, she will be able to keep expanding her store and her profits. Fortunately, she has the support of her children, which gives her the strength to walk on with firm steps. Upon settling her debt, she hopes to keep improving her store so that she will always have a sure income after she retires.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing.

loans.name: Selestine

texts.en:
Selestine is a responsible and diligent smallholder farmer from Kiera village who is involved in dairy, poultry and horticultural farming. Her work brings home an important source of income. Selestine is married and has two children who help her with the work. 

Selestine is seeking a loan to construct a cowshed. With your loan investment, her cows will be housed to protect them from harsh weather conditions, such as extreme heat, and for easier management of the herd. This intervention will result in improved health and dairy management, both keys to having a highly productive dairy farm. 

Income resulting from this intervention will be used to clear loan repayments and meet Selestine's family’s basic needs and wants.

loans.use: to construct a cowshed

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is a responsible and diligent smallholder farmer from the Chuka area of Kenya where she is involved in dairy, poultry, rabbit, goat and tree farming. Her work brings home an important source of income. Agnes is married and has seven children who help her with the work. 

Agnes is seeking a loan to construct a cowshed. With your loan investment, her two cows will be housed to protect them from harsh weather conditions, such as extreme heat, and for easier management of the herd. This intervention will result in improved health and dairy management, both keys to having a highly productive dairy farm. 

Income resulting from this intervention will be used to clear loan repayments and meet Agnes’s family’s basic needs and wants.

loans.use: to construct a cowshed

loans.name: Maria Corina

texts.es: María tiene 53 años de edad vive en compañía junto a su compañero de vida. Es una mujer muy emprendedora ella se dedica a la elaboración de tortillas desde hace 2 años por el cual desde muy temprano se levanta a cocer el maíz ya que si no tuviera este negocio no podría tener sus ingresos económicos. María necesita de mas productos básicos que le ayuden a que su negocio crezca más y así poder tener más clientela ya que ella vendía solo para el almuerzo y ahora quiere vender para la cena, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: maíz por quintal, un tambo de gas propano, cal etc, y así seguir elaborando sus tortillas ya que le permitirá tener otra mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María, age 53, lives with her life partner.  She is a very enterprising woman, who has been making tortillas for two years.  In order to do, so she gets up very early to cook the corn.  If she did not have this business, she would not be able to have any income.

María needs more basic products to help her business grow more.  This way she will be able to have more customers.  She used to only sell lunch, and now she wants to sell dinner.  That is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy corn by the ‘quintal’ [about one hundred pounds], a tank of propane gas, and lime powder, etc.  This way she will continue making her tortillas, which will allow her to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn by the ‘quintal’ [about one hundred pounds], a tank of propane gas, and lime powder, etc.

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr: Yawa une femme mariée qui vit à Avédji avec ses cinq enfants. Agée de 48 ans, Yawa est une commerçante de fruits au marché pour gagner son bénéfice. Yawa trouve son revenu à travers ce commerce. Yawa s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au marché de Lomé. Pour commander des sacs d’avocat et d’orange, Yawa sollicite ce microcrédit pour réaliser son achat afin d’avoir le bénéfice qui pourrait soutenir son mari à favoriser l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Yawa, age 48, is a married mother of five who lives in Avédji. She makes a living selling fruit at the market. She stocks up three times per month at the market of Lomé. 

Yawa is seeking this loan to buy bags of avocados and oranges; she hopes that her profits can help her husband to support their children’s education.

loans.use: to buy 4 bags of avocados and 4 bags of oranges.

loans.name: Jose Rudys

texts.es:
José, ha mantenido la carpintería produciendo muebles para vender y de esta manera sus ingresos son fijos, actualmente no ha tenido dificultades para desarrollar sus actividades y cubre sin problemas las necesidades familiares.
Considera necesario tener un mejor inventario en su negocio por lo que está solicitando un nuevo crédito para comprar clavos, madera, junco, etc., para fabricar sillas, camas y otro tipo de muebles para seguir atendiendo las demandas de sus clientes.
texts.en: José has continued to work as a carpenter, making items of furniture to sell. As a result, he has a regular income and, so far, has had no problems in developing his business and covering the household expenses. He believes that he needs to increase his stock and so he is seeking a new loan to buy nails, wood, cane, etc. to make chairs, beds and other furniture so he can continue to meet his customers' orders.

loans.use: to buy nails, wood, cane, etc. to make chairs, beds and other furniture and continue to meet his customers' orders.

loans.name: Edix Mercedes

texts.es:
Edix, identifica la necesidad de mejorar su negocio para continuar brindando un buen servicio a sus clientes, el nuevo crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra estantes y pintura para mejorar el local, también comprara granos básicos, bebidas, boquitas, etc., para cubrir las necesidades de sus clientes, tiene la fe en Dios que las ventas continúen creciendo para tener resultados positivos.
Está satisfecha por los beneficios que ha tenido al haber invertido el crédito anterior en la tienda, la familia continua teniendo el mismo núcleo y las circunstancias económicas son más estables.
texts.en: Edix, has identified a need to improve her business so she can continue to serve her customers well. She will use the loan she is applying for to buy shelves and paint to improve her premises and will also buy basic grains, drinks, snacks, etc. to meet her customers' needs. She believes that, with God's help, her sales will continue to grow and she will have positive results. She is happy with the positive results she gained after investing her previous loan in her shop. Her family remains the same and their financial situation is more stable.

loans.use: to buy shelves and paint to improve her premises. She will also buy basic grains, drinks and snacks to meet her customers' needs

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Mairambek

texts.ru: Майрамбек успешно погасил свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Он благодарен фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ему в финансировании. В хозяйстве Майрамбека на сегодня есть 6 коров. На 0,64 Га земли он выращивает картофель для реализации. Ежемесячный доход Майрамбека составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). Он решил и дальше развивать свой бизнес и обратился в Банк «Бай–Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят. Майрамбек входит в группу "Бакыт", в эту группу входят еще 2 человека. Майрамбек - лидер группы. Доходы от кредита он планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и хочет накопить на постройку дома с сараем для скота.
texts.en: Mairambek successfully paid off his loan after using it for its intended purpose.  He's grateful to Kiva and everyone who helped finance his loan.  Mairambek currently has 6 cows on his farm as well as 0.64 hectares of land for growing potatoes as a cash crop.  Mairambek's monthly income is about 10,000 som.  He's decided to further develop his business, and has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 100,000 som to buy calves.  Mairambek is a member of the Bakyt group along with two other people.  Mairambek is the leader of the group.  He plans on using his extra income due to the loan to add  more livestock to his farm in the future, and wants to save money to build a house with a barn for his livestock.

loans.use: buy some calves to bolster his herd

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan, se dedica a sembrar diversos cultivos como maíz, frijol, tomates, ejotes, entre otros, tiene varios años de trabajar de forma independientes, además práctica la crianza de animales domésticos, lo hace con un horario de seis de la mañana a cuatro de la tarde, cuenta con mucha experiencia que lo respalda. Juan vive con su familia, tiene 4 hijos y ello le colaboran en el negocio.
Invertirá en insumos agrícolas para ir preparando el terreno en el que sembrara, posteriormente fumigara sus cultivos para que no sean afectados por las plagas, espera comprar los materiales básicos para obtener una cosecha abundante y que le facilite abastecer a sus clientes.
Sus sueños son expandir el cultivo de hortalizas, tener mejores ganancias para ampliar su vivienda.
texts.en: Juan grows various crops such as corn, beans, tomatoes and green beans. He has been self-employed for a number of years and also rears barnyard animals. He works from 6 am to 4 pm and has built up a large amount of experience. He lives with his family, including his 4 children who help him in his business. he will use the loan to buy agricultural supplies so he can prepare the land on which he will sow his crops and then to spray his crops to protect them from pests. He hope to buy the basic supplies he needs to have a good harvest and meet his customers' demands. His ambitions are to grow more vegetables and boost his income so he can extend his home.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies so he can prepare the land on which he will sow his crops and then to spray his crops to protect them from pests

loans.name: Juana Del Socorro

texts.es:
Juana es considerada una mujer trabajadora, pues a sus 63 años sigue laborando en su venta de refrescos y gaseosas, negocio que ha sacado adelante con todo su esfuerzo y con el apoyo de su esposo. A sus dos años de haber emprendido con esto, ha invertido para nutrir sus ventas, en su último préstamo pudo comprar gaseosas de todas las marcas y frutas para sus refrescos. Los resultados fueron más que positivos, pues ahorró dinero y tuvo grandes ventas. Tras ver tantas bendiciones, Juana aprovecha para agradecer a todas las personas que le han apoyado con ese crédito.
Actualmente se siente agradecida y decidida a seguir invirtiendo, después de ver el gran avance que tuvo. Razón por la que solicita un nuevo préstamo para comprar gaseosas, frutas, bolsas y azúcar, con esto podrá producir refrescos de calidad y vender de todas las gaseosas que demandan sus clientes. La buena venta le traerá a Juana grandes ingresos, por lo que podrá seguir ahorrando para continuar construyendo la casa en el terreno que acaba de comprar.
texts.en:
Juana is considered a hardworking woman. She is 63 years old and and continues to work selling juices and sodas. This business has helped her move forward with all of her strength and the support of her husband. When her business was two years old, she decided to invest in her business to nourish her sales. With her previous loan, she bought soft drinks of all different flavors and brands. The results from this were more than positive. She was able to save money and she increased her sales. After seeing such blessings, Juana wants to take this opportunity to thank all of the people who have supported her through this loan. 

Currently, Juana feels grateful and has decided to keep investing in her business after seeing the great improvement that she made last time. For this reason, Juana is requesting another loan. She will buy soft drinks, fruit, bags, and sugar. With these she will be able to produce quality soft drinks to sell to her customers. These sales will bring Juana large profits, which she will allow her to keep saving money and continue building her house on the land she just bought.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, bags, and sugar.

loans.name: Tahmina

texts.ru: Тахмине  36 лет. Родилась и выросла в городе Душанбе.  У нее среднее образование. Тахмина замужем и мать четверых детей. Ее муж настоявшее время находится вдали от семьи – он на заработках в Российской Федерации. Тахмина городская женщина, и она швея. Она занимается этим около 6 лет. Ей очень нравится ее работа, и шьет с удовольствием. Она приветливая женщина и люди к ней тянутся. Для дальнейшей работы ей нужна многофункциональная современная машина для шитья, потому новая технология работает намного лучше. Поэтому Тахмина просит кредит для покупки швейной машины. Она верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Tahmina is 36 years old.  She was born and raised in the city of Dushanbe and has a secondary education.  She is married and the mother of four children.  Her husband is currently living far away from the family as he is working in the Russian Federation.  Tahmina is a city woman and a seamstress.  She has been involved in this activity for almost six years now.  She really enjoys her work and she sews with pleasure.  Tahmina is very friendly; people are naturally drawn to her.

In order to pursue her activity, Tahmina needs a modern multi-function sewing machine because the new technology is much better.  For this reason, she is taking a loan to buy a sewing machine.  She is confident that you will help her and offer your support.

loans.use: to buy a modern multi-function sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence is a hard-working woman. She is 21 years old and lives in the town of Zana in the Kampala region of Uganda. She is married and has two children who are both currently in school.

For the past year, Florence has been working hard to manage her bricklaying business. To help expand her business, Florence has requested a loan of 300,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more materials for bricklaying, and it will help Florence to generate greater profits and add capital to business.

Florence hopes that in the future she will be able to build a rental house.

Florence is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy more materials for bricklaying.

loans.name: Racheal

texts.en:
Racheal is a hardworking woman. She is 21 years old and lives in the town of Zanna in the Kampala region of Uganda. She is married and has three children, two of whom are currently in school. 

For the past two years, Racheal has been working hard to manage her clothing business, where she sells clothes. To help expand her business, Racheal requested a loan of 300,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more clothes, and will help Racheal to generate greater profits and educate her children. Racheal hopes that in the future she will be able to buy a plot of land. 

Racheal is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy more clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a cart.

loans.name: Harriet

texts.en:
Harriet is a hard-working woman. She is 22 years old and lives in the town of Zana in the Kampala region of Uganda. She is married and has three children who are all currently in school.

For the past year, Harriet has been working hard to manage her poultry business, which rears chickens. To help expand her business, Harriet has requested a loan of 800,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy birds, feed, and vaccines, and it will help Harriet to generate greater profits and provide basic needs for the family.

Harriet hopes that in the future she will be able to educate her children.

Harriet is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy birds, feed, and vaccines.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more drinks.

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan is a hardworking woman. She is 22 years old and lives in the town of Zanna in the Kampala region of Uganda. She does not have children. 

For the past three years, Joan has been working hard to manage her salon, where she is a hairdresser. To help expand her business, Joan requested a loan of 600,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more salon chemicals and shampoo. This will help Joan to generate greater profits and improve her business. Joan hopes that in the future she will be able to expand the business. 

Joan is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy more salon chemicals and shampoo.

loans.name: Teopista

texts.en:
Teopista is a hardworking woman. She is 22 years old and lives in the town of Zanna in the Kampala region of Uganda. She is married and has two children who are all currently in school. 

For the past three years, Teopista has been working hard to manage her poultry business, where she rears chicken. To help expand her business, Teopista requested a loan of 500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy poultry feed, and will help Teopista to generate greater profits and provide basic needs for her family. Teopista hopes that in the future she will be able to build a house. 

Teopista is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy poultry feed.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is a hardworking woman. She is 21 years old and lives in the town of Zanna in the Kampala region of Uganda. She is married and has one child. 

For the past three years, Jennifer has been working hard to manage her salon where she is a hairdresser. To help expand her business, Jennifer requested a loan of 300,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy hair chemicals, and will help Jennifer generate greater profits and improve her business. Jennifer hopes that in the future she will be able to build a house.

Jennifer is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy hair chemicals.

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina is a 44-year-old married woman. She is living with her husband and four children, two of whom are still attending school. All the family members cooperate together in order to satisfy their needs.

Due to a difficult financial situation, and in order to support her family, today Amina is asking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. She will be utilizing the loan to pay her children’s educational fees.

Amina said that she is very happy because this loan will help her to change her children’s lifestyle.

loans.use: to pay her children’s educational fees

loans.name: Anarkan

texts.ru: Анаркан успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве Анаркан есть 2 коровы, 5 овец, лошадь. На 0,98 Га земли выращивает картофель и кукурузу для реализации. Ежемесячные доходы Анаркан составляют на сегодня - 7,600 сом (KGS). Она обратилась повторно в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку нетели. Анаркан входит в группу "Бакыт", в эту группу входят еще 2 человека. Анаркан является третьим членом группы. Доходы от кредита она будет вкладывать в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Anarkan successfully repaid her loan, after using it for its intended purpose.  She is thankful to Kiva and to all the lenders who helped her get this financing.  She currently has two cows, five sheep and one horse on her farm.  She also grows potatoes and corn for resale on 0.98 hectares of land.  Today, she makes a monthly income of 7,600 som (KGS).  

Anarkan has once more turned to Bai Tuhum Bank and she is requesting a loan of 30,000 som (KGS) to buy a heifer.  She is the third member of the "Bakyt" group, which comprises another two people.  She is planing to use the proceeds from her loan to further increase her numbers of farm animals.  She is also planning to save enough money to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy one heifer in order to increase her livestock headcount.

loans.name: Nidia Stella

texts.es:
Con su sonrisa y gran corazón, Nidia ha tenido una gran acogida en su barrio desde que abrió su restaurante hace 3 años con gran esfuerzo y con un deseo en su mente, el de salir adelante y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.

El crédito que solicita es para comprar sillas e instalar una barra en su local.

Con esto, podrá continuar cocinando y preparando las delicias que con sus manos trabajadoras ha venido ofreciendo y sirviendo.
Su principal dificultad es la competencia.

Apoya a Nidia con su negocio y has que su vida sea mejor con un préstamo!
texts.en:
With her smile and big heart, Nidia has been very successful in her neighborhood since she opened her restaurant three years ago. She opened her restaurant with great effort and with a desire to get ahead and improve her family's living conditions. 

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy chairs and to install a bar counter in her restaurant. With this, she will be able to continue cooking and preparing the delicious food that she has been offering and serving with her hardworking hands. Nidia's main challenge is her competition. 

Support Nidia with her business and make her life better with a loan!

loans.use: to buy chairs and install a bar counter in her shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more clothes.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is a hardworking woman. She is 18 years old and lives in the town of Zanna in the Kampala region of Uganda. She does not have children. 

For the past year, Juliet has been working hard to manage her charcoal business, where she sells charcoal. To help expand her business, Juliet requested a loan of 700,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more sacks of charcoal, and will help Juliet generate greater profits and provide basic needs for her family. Juliet hopes that in the future she will be able to expand the business. 

Juliet is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
Lilian is a hardworking woman. She is 18 years old and lives in the town of Zanna in the Kampala region of Uganda. She does not have children. 

For the past year, Lilian has been working hard to manage her food-vending business where she sells cooked food and soft drinks. To help expand her business, Lilian requested a loan of 700,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more food items, and will help Lilian generate greater profits and become a known business woman. Lilian hopes that in the future she will be able to develop herself. 

Lilian is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy more food items.

loans.name: Martha Luisa

texts.es:
Martha, ve que no cuenta con el inventario necesario para ir cumpliendo con la demandas de sus nuevos clientes, por tal razón se decidió a solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar pollitos recién nacidos, concentrados y vitaminas, para tener animales saludables y satisfacer los pedidos de sus clientes, espera que las nuevas ventas se mantengan.
Para ella la ayuda del crédito anterior ha sido de mucho beneficio para tener un negocio mejor establecido y atraer a más clientes, su familia se mantiene y las condiciones económicas son favorables para ir cumpliendo con sus obligaciones.
texts.en: Martha, seeing as she does not have the inventory needed to continue to fill the demand from her new clients has decided to request a new loan to buy recently born chicks, concentrated feed and vitamins to have healthy animals and satisfy the demand of her clients. She hopes that her new sales continue. The support from the last loan has been very beneficial for her to have a better established business and attract new clients. Her family is well and her economic situation is favorable for her to continue fulfilling her obligations.

loans.use: to buy recently born chicks, concentrated feed and vitamins to have healthy animals and satisfy the demand of her clients.

loans.name: Wnifed

texts.en:
Wnifed is a hardworking woman. She is 21 years old and lives in the town of Zanna in the Kampala region of Uganda. She does not have children. 

For the past two years, Wnifed has been working hard to manage her clothing business, where she sells clothes. To help expand her business, Wnifed requested a loan of 500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more clothes, and will help Wnifed generate greater profits and pay her school fees. Wnifed hopes that in the future she will be able to open a fashion design school. 

Wnifed is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy oil, potatoes, chicken, tomatoes, flour, etc. to have the raw materials to make her snacks to sell.

loans.name: Carlos Marcial

texts.es:
Carlos, vive con su esposa y sus hijos de 25 y 30 años de edad; el negocio familiar es una granja de pollos y lo poseen desde hace 17 años, su negocio se ve muy estable, toda la familia trabaja con él y todos los días salen a vender gallinas y huevos para generar los recursos económicos necesarios para el sustento familiar.
Ha solicitado un crédito para comprar concentrado y pollos recién nacidos, fortalecerá su inventario para cuidar mejor de sus animales y atender a nuevos clientes, el objetivo de Carlos, es que su negocio sea más competitivo en el mercado y que siempre esté funcionando.
Los sueños que Carlos tiene son ampliar su negocio, disminuir su nivel de endeudamiento y lo más importante darle a los miembros de su familia un mejor estilo de vida.
texts.en: Carlos lives with his wife and children of 25 and 30 years of age. The family business is a chicken farm that they have owned for 17 years. His business is very stable, all of the family work with him and every day they go out to sell chickens and eggs to generate the resources necessary to maintain the family. Carlos has requested a loan to buy chicken feed and baby chicks. This will beef up his inventory so that he can improve the care of his animals and attend to new clients. His objective is for his business to be more competitive in the market and that it continues to function. The dreams of Carlos are to grow his business, reduce his level of debt and, most importantly, provide the members of his family a better lifestyle,

loans.use: to buy commercial chicken feed and baby chicks, increasing his inventory to better care for his animals and to accommodate new clients.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es: Rafael de 49 años de  edad, vive en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida con quien lleva varios años juntos. Rafael es una persona muy responsable que desde hace 20 años se dedica a la venta de electrodomésticos y muebles para el hogar en un centro comercial cercano a su vivienda y gracias a sus ingresos y los que recibe de parte de su hijo quien hace un tiempo emigro  al extranjero en busca de una mejor oportunidad laboral y mejores ingresos económicos, Rafael ha sido capaz de salir adelante y llevar a diario el pan de cada día a su hogar. Rafael vive en una  casa hecha de lamina completamente y  hace poco tiempo comenzó la construcción de su vivienda con ladrillo para de esta forma mejorar su condición de vida, pero debido a la situación económica no pudo terminar la construcción es por ello que ha decidido solicitar un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: ladrillo, arena, hierro, lámina, polines, puerta y ventana para terminar la construcción de su vivienda y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rafael is 49 years old.  He lives in his own home together with his life partner, who he has been with for several years.  Rafael is a very responsible person.  For the last 20 years, he has made a living selling appliances and home furniture in a shopping center near his home.  Thanks to his income and income he receives from his son who emigrated abroad some time ago in search of better job opportunities and better income, Rafael has been able to move forward and provide for the daily needs of his home.  

Rafael lives in a house made completely of metal sheets.  Not long ago, he began construction on his home with brick in order to improve his living conditions.  However, due to the economic situation he was not able to finish construction.  For this reason, he has decided to request a loan from FUSAI to buy brick, sand, iron, metal sheets, beams, a door and window to finish the construction of his home and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy brick, sand, iron, metal sheets, beams, a door and window to finish construction on his home.

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru: Gulbahor is a hardworking woman. She was born in northern part of Tajikistan in 1977. She is living in village with her family. She is married and has five children. Her husband is a farmer. She has ten years experience of planting agricultural products in her land. Her family is big and friendly. They help each other in their activities. Each season she gains well harvest to ensure and feed her family. Coming season she plans to process and fertilize her land to obtain a well harvest. She is asking a loan to buy fertilizer and pay for rental workers. She hopes to be supported and awaits KIVA lenders compassion.
texts.en: Gulbahor is a hardworking woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1977. She and her family live in a village. She is married and has five children. Her husband is a farmer. She has ten years' experience of crop farming on her land. Her family is big and friendly. They help each other in their activities. Each season she gets a good harvest to provide for and feed her family. In the coming season she plans to treat her land with fertilizer to get a good harvest. She is asking a loan to buy the fertilizer and to pay for hired workers. She hopes that she will receive support and looks forward to the compassion of Kiva's lenders.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for hired workers.

loans.name: Ines Cordero

texts.es:
Inés, utilizo el crédito anterior para tener nueva mercadería en su tienda, sus clientes se mantienen satisfechos y hasta la fecha no ha enfrentado problemas para trabajar, en cuanto a su grupo familiar dice que todos comparten un estilo de vida más confortable.
Hace la solicitud de un nuevo crédito para comprar golosinas, pan, huevos, detergentes, jabón, y oros productos de la canasta básica para que sus clientes encuentren lo que necesiten, su objetivo es mantener un inventario bien surtido para que las ventas sigan creciendo, así como también sus ganancias.
texts.en: Inés used his previous loan to obtain new merchandise for his store. His clients are happy and up until now he has not had any problems working and he says that his family are sharing in a more comfortable lifestyle. He is applying for a new loan to buy sweets, bread, eggs, detergent, soap and other staples so that his customers have what they need. His objective is to maintain a good assortment of products so that sales continue growing along with his profits.

loans.use: to buy candy, bread, eggs, detergent, soap and other staples so that his customers have what they need,

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
Lidia, es soltera y ha tenido cinco hijos, sin ayuda tuvo que salir adelante con su familia, actualmente vive con una de sus hijas, los demás son independientes; ella se dedica a vender ropa desde hace mucho tiempo para generar ingresos con los que cubre sus necesidades y así pudo criar a sus hijos, trabaja a tiempo de lunes a viernes sin un horario establecido.
Opta por un crédito para renovar su inventario, comprara camisas, fadas, vestidos, pantalones y ropa interior, será de mucha ayuda para tener un negocio más competitivo, pretende incrementar  sus ingresos  y mantener a sus clientes satisfechos.
Sus sueños son mantener funcionando su negocio, cambiar el estilo de vida familiar y cancelar su deuda.
texts.en:
Lidia is single and had five children and had to raise her family without any help. She currently lives with one of her daughters, the others are independent. She has worked selling clothing for a long time in order to generate income to pay for her needs and she was able to bring up her children. She works from Monday to Friday with no fixed schedule.

She has decided on a loan to renew her inventory buying shirts, shirts, dresses, pants and underwear which will help to have a more competitive business. She hopes to increase her income and keep her clients satisfied. Her dreams are to keep her business running, change the family's lifestyle and pay off her debt.

loans.use: to buy shirts, shirts, dresses, pants and underwear which will help to have a more competitive business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase goats and sheep to help him to upgrade his living standards

loans.name: Raul

texts.es:
Raúl, necesita un nuevo crédito para comprar abono, insecticidas, plaguicidas y semilla de maíz, para sembrar en el tiempo justo, espera que la cosecha sea abundante y de calidad, pues así tendrá como alimentar a su familia y también abastecerá a sus clientes.
El préstamo anterior le ha sido de utilidad para desarrollar sus actividades agrícolas, tiene estabilidad económica y su familia vive en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Raul needs a new loan to buy fertilizer, insecticides, pesticides, and corn seed, to plant at the right time.  He hopes that the harvest will be abundant and of quality, in order to feed his family and also supply it to his customers.

The previous loan has been useful to develop his agricultural activities.  He has economic stability and his family lives in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticides, pesticides, and corn seed, for planting at the right time, hoping that the harvest is abundant and of quality.

loans.name: Gulmira

texts.ru: Гулмира  полностью погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве Гулмиры есть 15 коров, 80 овец, на 0,32 Га земли она выращивает кукурузу для реализации. Ежемесячная прибыль Гулмиры - около 8,000 сом (KGS). Она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят для откорма и перепродажи. Гулмира входит в группу "Бакыт", в которой состоят еще 2 человека. Доходы от кредита Гулмира планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Gulmira completely paid back her loan, having used it for its intended purpose. She is grateful to the Kiva fund and to everyone who helped to finance her. Gulmira's farm has 15 cows and 80 sheep, and she grows corn for sale on 0.32 hectares of land. Gulmira's monthly profit is about 8,000 som (KGS). She has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 40,000 som (KGS) to buy some calves for fattening and resale. Gulmira is a member of the "Bakyt" group which comprises another two people. Gulmira plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in further increasing her number of domestic livestock.

loans.use: to buy some calves for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Şerife İnci

texts.en:
Şerife is married and a mother of four. In order to support the children with their educational expenses, she became a representative of sales via network business (health and diet products). First she sold to her neighbors, but in time she had a large potential of customers.  This is her first loan from Maya.  With the help of her loan she bought products in bulk and increased her profit.


Translated from Turkish by Maya staff

Şerife Hanım evli ve 3 çocuk annesi.  Çocuklarının eğitim masraflarını karşılamak ve eşine destek olmak amacıyla network işi (sağlık ürünleri zayıflama vs)yapmaya başlamış.  Önce yakın çevresine satış yapmış daha sonra zamanla müşteri potansiyelini artırmış.  Mayadan ilk kredisini kullanan Şerife İnci hanım toplu miktarda ürün alarak kar oranını artırdı.

loans.use: to buy health and diet products

loans.name: Gülizar

texts.en:
Gülizar is a mother of three. For years she has been making and selling trousseau and making money for her family. For the last three years she has been making bathrobes and selling them on stands. With the help of the loan, she is planning to buy towel fabrics, produce more bathrobes, sell them and expand her business.

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff
Gülizar hanım üç çocuk annesi.  Yıllarca çeyiz işi yaparak aile ekonomisine katkı sağlamış.  Üç yıldır çocuk bornozu dikiyor ve stantlarda satıyor.  Aldığı mikro kredi ile havlu kumaş alarak ve bornoz dikerek satışlarını artırmayı ve işini geliştirmeyi planlıyor.

loans.use: to buy towel fabrics to produce more bathrobes

loans.name: Juan Pastor

texts.es:
Juan  es un pequeño productor de café de la zona Norte de Nicaragua. Vive junto a su esposa y sus 2 hijos en su finca de 40 mz, de las cuales 10 son de café. En el último año su producción de café fue de 220 quintales pergamino. Su meta es incrementar los rendimientos productivos de su plantación de café, renovando las plantas improductivas. 

Para ello, este productor está solicitando un financiamiento para la renovación de 3 manzanas de café. Este tipo de inversión, incrementará la competitividad de su pequeña finca y además generará empleo en la comunidad. 

Su esfuerzo y la implementación de las actividades derivadas de un plan de manejo integral en su finca, le permitirá a este productor obtener mejores rendimientos y por tanto, mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Juan is a small coffee producer in the North part of Nicaragua. He lives together with his wife and his two children on a 40 manzana farm (70 acres), ten of which are planted with coffee. Last year his coffee production was 220 quintals of parchment coffee.

His goal is to increase the productive yield of his coffee plantation replacing the unproductive plants. To do this this producer is requesting a loan to replant 3 manzanas of coffee. With this kind of investment he will increase the competitiveness of his small farm and also generate employment in the community.

His efforts and the implementation of the activities derived from an integrated management plan for his farm will allow this producer to obtain higher yields and therefore greater income.

loans.use: to renovate 3 manzanas (about 5 acres) of coffee and increase production.

loans.name: Maria Elisa

texts.es: María  es una señora  casada, está en sus 45 años de edad, tiene 5 hijos de las edades de 10, 12, 19, 21 y 25 años de edad. María se dedica a la crianza de animales menores que los compra pequeños y al venderlos obtiene  sus ganancias, María solicita el dinero del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de chanchos. El esposo de María se dedica a trabajar al jornal de trabajos de agricultura, Maria tiene la aspiración que es la de seguir en su negocio y mejorarlo para que sus ingresos  le alcancen para pagar los estudios de sus hijos ya que le gustaría que a futuro lleguen a ser  unos profesionales y asi tengan mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María, who is 45 years old, is a married woman. She has 5 children aged 10, 12, 19, 21 and 25 years. Her husband works as an agricultural day labourer. María makes a living raising farmyard animals which she buys when they are small and makes her profit when she sells them. 

She is asking for the money from the loan to invest in buying pigs.  Her aspiration is to continue with her business and improve it so that her income is sufficient to pay for her children's education, because in the future she would like them to become professionals and so have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Jose Lucio

texts.es: José tiene 40 años de edad y vive junto a su grupo familiar compuesto por su madre, dos hermanos y su hijo de 10  años de edad quien con esfuerzos de su padre se encuentra estudiando. José desde hace veinticinco años se dedica a la albañilería y gracias a su alta experiencia y la calidad en el oficio hace que las personas lo busquen para que sea él quien les trabaje en alguna construcción que necesiten. José debido a que desea darle mejor comodidad a su único hijo que cada día va creciendo y a la vez con el objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida quiere ampliar su vivienda y construir un cuarto de habitación y para ello ha decidido adquirir un crédito en FUSAI para invertir en: ladrillo, arena, piedra, grava, lamina, polines, para construir un cuarto  dormitorio.
texts.en:
José is 40 years old and lives with his family made up of his mother, two siblings and his ten year old son who through the efforts of his father is studying. For the past 25 years José has worked as a bricklayer and thanks to his vast experience and the quality of his work, people seek him out to work in any construction that is needed.

Because José wants to provide more comfort for his only son who is growing up day by day and at the same time with the goal of improving his quality of living wants to expand his house and add a bedroom. So he has decided to obtain a loan from FUSAI to invest in bricks, sand, gravel, stones, laminated sheeting and beams to construct a bedroom.

loans.use: to invest in bricks, sand, gravel, stones, laminated sheeting and beams to construct a bedroom.

loans.name: Nancy Carolina

texts.es:
Nancy, es una persona acompañada, vive con su pareja, por el momento no tienen hijos, tiene su propia actividad económica la cual consiste en elaborar pupusas para vender en su comunidad, su negocio funciona desde hace 4 años, ya es muy popular en el lugar por el buen servicio que ofrecen a sus clientes.
Invertirá el capital en la compra de materia prima como harina, quesillo, aceite, chicharrón, etc.,  para elaborar la venta de pupusas, la finalidad de su decisión es aumentar la productividad del negocio para atender  las demandas de sus clientes y generar más ingresos con los que podrá disminuir las necesidades básicas de su hogar.
Sus proyectos son tener un negocio mucho más amplio, cancelar sus deudas y mantener a sus clientes satisfechos.
texts.en:
Nancy is in a relationship and lives with her partner. For the time being they do not have any children. She has her own business which consists of making pupusas [thick corn tortillas stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans] to sell in her community. Her business has been running for 4 years and is already very popular locally because of the good service she gives her customers.

She will invest the capital in buying raw ingredients such as flour, fresh cheese, oil, pork rinds etc. for making and selling pupusas. The purpose of this decision is to increase the productivity of her business to meet her customers' demands and to make more income which she can use to cover the basic needs of the household.

Her projects are to have a much bigger business, pay off her debts and keep her customers happy.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients such as flour, fresh cheese, oil, pork rinds etc. for making and selling pupusas.

loans.name: Rosmeri

texts.es:
Rosmeri tiene 26 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en el distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la Sierra norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente al comercio y crianza de ganado menor.

Rosmeri se dedica a brindar servicio alquiler de transporte de su vehículo (mototaxi), actividad que realiza desde hace más de 2 años, cuenta con experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento a su vehículo, con esto Rosmeri espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Rosmeri is 26 years old and lives with her husband and their two children in the district of Pucará, located in the Jaén province and Cajamarca region, in the northern highlands of Peru.  Life in the community is quiet; its residents are mostly engaged in trade and small livestock breeding.

Rosmeri makes a living offering transportation services on her vehicle (motorcycle taxi), an occupation that she has performed for more than 2 years, with much experience in the business and with very good personal and work references in the region.  The loan will be used for repairs and maintenance on her vehicle.  With this, Rosmeri hopes to offer a better service to her customers which will generate more income and thus improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to repair and maintain her vehicle.

loans.name: Sandra Maribel

texts.es: Sandra es una señora muy alegre, Sandra está casada y tiene  2 hijos de 3 y 6 años de edad, Sandra creció y vive en el campo y comenta que su fuente de ingresos es la crianza de  animales y del jornal de actividades de agricultura, el esposo de Sandra se dedica a trabajar de chofer, Sandra solicita el dinero del crédito para comprar cuyes, Sandra ama a su familia y comenta que  tiene el suficiente ánimo para luchar por el bienestar de sus hijos.
texts.en: Sandra is a very happy woman. She is married and has two children aged 3 and 6 years old. Sandra was raised and lives in the country and says that her source of income is raising animals and agricultural day labor. Sandra's husband works as a driver. Sandra is requesting the loan to buy guinea pigs. Sandra loves her family and comments that she has the energy to fight for the well-being of her children.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs.

loans.name: Chynara

texts.ru: Чынара, 43 года, замужем, мать 4 детей. У Чынары среднее образование. В настоящее время она занимается животноводством и полеводством, по хозяйству помогают супруг и младший сын. Чынара с большой ответственностью относится к своему делу. Ежегодно обрабатывает 1,0 Га земли, выращивает кукурузу и картофель, в хозяйстве есть 4 коровы, 2 лошади. Чынара обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 75,000 сом (KGS) для покупки лошади для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Чынара направит на дальнейшее развитие бизнеса, также хочет накопить на постройку сарая.
texts.en: Chynara is 43 years old, married, and the mother of four children. Chynara has a secondary education. At the present time she rears animals and grows crops. Her husband and youngest son help her on the farm. Chynara approaches her work with great responsibility. Each year she cultivates 1.0 hectares of land where she grows corn and potatoes, and she has four cows and two horses. Chynara has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 75,000 som (KGS) to buy a horse in order to increase her herd. Chynara plans to direct the proceeds of the loan towards the further development of her business, and she also wants to save up to build a barn.

loans.use: to buy a horse in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Kasymbek

texts.ru: Касымбек, 45 лет, женат, вместе с супругой воспитывают 4 детей. У Касымбека - среднее образование, в качестве дохода для своей семьи он занимается животноводством и полеводством, благодаря упорному труду Касымбека, в его хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 коровы, а также земельный надел мерою 2,0 ГА, где выращивает экологически чистые пшеницу и кукурузу с дальнейшей реализацией. Накопленные средства стараются вкладывать в развитие и расширение бизнеса. Касымбек обратился в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сомов (KGS) на покупку коров, часть средств направит на обработку почвы. Доходы от кредита позволят Касымбеку развить бизнес и улучшить благосостояние его семьи.
texts.en: Kasymbek is 45 years old, married, and he and his wife are raising four children. Kasymbek has a secondary education. He rears animals and grows crops to get income for his family. Thanks to Kasymbek's hard work, today he has four cows, and also a 2.0 hectare plot of land where he grows organic corn and corn for future sale. He strives to invest his savings in developing and expanding the business. Kasymbek has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy some cows. He will direct part of the funds to cultivating his land. The proceeds of the loan will enable Kasymbek to develop his business and improve his family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy some cows to increase his herd and to cultivate his land.

loans.name: Corina

texts.es:
Corina es una pequeña productora de café de la zona Norte de Nicaragua. Vive junto a su esposo y su hijo en su finca. En el último año su producción de café fue de  18 quintales pergamino. Su visión es incrementar los rendimientos productivos de su plantación de café, mediante procesos de renovación y un adecuado mantenimiento. 

La renovación en las plantaciones de café consiste en el reemplazo de plantas improductivas, en estos casos se calcula el área a renovar en base al número de plantas que se reemplazará. 

Para este año, la pequeña productora está solicitando un crédito de inversión que le permita realizar esta actividad, lo que le permitirá ir mejorando los rendimientos productivos de su cafetal, y con ellos los ingresos para su familia. La meta de Corina es aumentar su producción por medio de un incremento en áreas y rendimiento.
texts.en:
Corina is a small coffee producer in the northern zone of Nicaragua. She lives with her spouse and son on her farm. Last year, her coffee production was 18 quintals of coffee with husks. Her vision is to increase the the productive output of her coffee plantation through processes of improvement and adequate maintenance.

The improvement to the coffee plantation consists of replacing the unproductive plants; in those cases, the area to be updated is calculated based on the number of plants that will be replaced.

For this year, the small producer requests a loan that will permit her to carry out this activity, which will allow her to improve the productive output of her coffee plantation and income for her family. 

Corina's goal is to increase her production with a boost in some fields and increased yield.

loans.use: to buy supplies she needs to replace coffee plants.

loans.name: Jiguiseme Group

texts.fr:
Amphaye est la personne à droite tenant entre ses mains la corde attaché au bœuf. 
En vue  de pouvoir avoir une étude plus rentable dans l’exécution de l’élevage de ses bœufs Amphaye a rencontré quelques problèmes financiers ; des problèmes qui le met toujours en régression dans l’exécution de son travail, un besoin irrésistible qui lui a pousé à demander l’appui financier du RMCR envie d’acheter plus de bœufs, il fait ses achats dans les foires locales et après avoir de  les élevés il les vend dans les mêmes foires. Il fait cette activité depuis 05 ans, il réside au MALI il est alphabétisé, âgée de 44 ans, père de 05 enfants tous âgées de 18 à 02 ans dont 01 est  scolarisé sa conjointe fait le ménage à la maison. Il rêve de construire sa maison en dure et de pouvoir couvrir les frais scolaires et médicaux de ses enfants. il rencontre quelques difficultés dans son travail tel que la chute des prix sur le marché et les maladies épidémiques, il possède une technique de vente qui lui permet de réaliser des bénéfices prévisionnel qui se varient entre 90000 à200000f par cycle de prêts
texts.en:
Amphaye, age 44, is a cattle farmer. He is the one holding an ox on a leash in the group photo. He has been practicing this activity for 5 years. He lives in Mali, he is literate, and he has five children ages 2 to 18, one of them in school. His spouse is a homemaker. 

While striving to sustain a successful business, he encountered financing problems along the way which have caused recurring setbacks in his work. This has led to his decision to partner with RMCR to buy more cattle. He buys oxen at local fairs, raises them and resells them at the same venues. His selling technique allows him to earn profits ranging from 90,000 to 200,000F per loan cycle. Some of the obstacles he has to face are drops in market prices and epidemic diseases.   

His goals are to build a sturdy home and to cover his children’s tuition fees and healthcare costs.

loans.use: to buy cattle to raise.

loans.name: Dildora

texts.ru:
Молодая, красива, активная, умная, талантливая девушка Дилдора. Ей всего 18 лет. Она из городка Турсунзаде. Дилдора живет вместе отцом, матерью и сестрой. Она самостоятельная девушка, и старается, помогает родителям обеспечить семью и улучшить жилищные условия жизни семьи. Дилдора более 3 года работает в салоне красоты. Она предоставляет услуги стилиста, визажиста также услуги маникюра и педикюра. Еще она работает в свадебном салоне, где дают напрокат свадебное платье. Ее салон красоты находится возле свадебном салоне. 
Дилдора решила помочь родителям отремонтировать дом. Ин не хватает денежных средств для купли стройматериалов. И по этой причине Дилдора обратилась за кредитом
texts.en:
This young, beautiful, active, clever, talented young lady is Dildora. She is just 18 years old. She is from the town of Tursun-zoda. Dildora lives with her father, mother and sister. She is an independent young lady, and tries to help her parents to provide for the family and improve the family's living conditions. Dildora has been working in a beauty salon for more than three years. She offers her services as a stylist and make-up artist, and also does manicures and pedicures. She also works in a bridal salon which rents wedding dresses. Her beauty salon is near to the bridal salon.

Dildora has decided to help her parents to renovate their house but she does not have enough funds to buy the construction materials. For this reason Dildora has applied for a loan.

loans.use: to renovate her house.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is a hard-working woman. She is 20 years old and lives in the town of Bulenga in the Kampala region of Uganda. She is married and has 2 children with 1 of them currently in school. For the past 2 years, Esther has been working hard to manage her farming business, which deals in agriculture. 

To help expand her business, Esther has requested a loan of 300,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more mushroom seeds, and will help Esther to generate greater profits and provide basic needs for the family. Esther hopes that in the future she will be able to build a big shopping center. 

Esther is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to purchase more mushroom seeds

loans.name: Recheal

texts.en:
Recheal is a hard-working woman. She is 19 years old and lives in the town of Bulenga in the Kampala region of Uganda. She is married and has one child. For the past 3 years, she has been working hard to manage her retail shop, which sells head cups, toys, and trousers. 

To help expand her business, Recheal has requested a loan of 300,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more children's toys, and will help her to generate greater profits and improve her business. She hopes that in the future she will be able to buy a plot of land. 

Recheal is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to purchase more children's toys

loans.name: Maria Sonia

texts.es:
María, es casada, tiene un hijo, la familia vive en una misma casa, el negocio que administra es una tienda de consumo y la crianza de ganado, lo fundo hace 25 años y aprendió a desarrollarlo con la ayuda de sus padres, actualmente lo hace con el apoyo de su esposo, trabaja en un horario de siete de la mañana a cinco de la tarde.
Ha solicitado un crédito para comprar una vaquilla y profilácticos para el ganado, fortalecerá el inventario de su negocio para ir mejorando su situación económica, espera tener animales sanos y bien alimentados.
Las aspiraciones de María son tener un negocio más amplio y así formar un patrimonio para su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is married, and she has one son. Her family lives in the same house. She makes a living managing a store that sells basic consumer products and raising livestock. She established her business 25 years ago, and she learned how to maintain it with the help of her parents. Currently, she does it with the support of her husband. She works from 7 in the morning until 5 in the afternoon.

She has requested a loan to buy a heifer and prophylactics for her livestock in order to strengthen the inventory of her business so that she can continue improving her economic situation. She hopes to have healthy and well-fed animals. Maria dreams of having a larger business so that she can create an inheritance for her family.

loans.use: to buy a heifer and prophylactics for her livestock in order to strengthen the inventory of her business so that she can continue improving her economic situation.

loans.name: Chynarkan

texts.ru: Чынаркан успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог в финансировании. В хозяйстве Чынаркан на сегодня есть 4 коровы, 15 овец, лошадь. На 3,24 Га земли она выращивает картофель, кукурузу и клевер для реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 24,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят и ягнят для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита Чынаркан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Chynarkan successfully repaid her loan, having used it for its intended purpose. She is grateful to the Kiva fund and to everyone who helped with financing. Today Chynarkan has four cows, fifteen sheep, and a horse. She grows potatoes, corn and clover for sale on 3.24 hectares of land. Her monthly income is about 24,000 som (KGS). In order to develop her business further, she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy some calves and lambs to increase her herd. Chynarkan plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in further increasing her number of domestic livestock.

loans.use: to buy some calves and lambs to increase her herd.

loans.name: Annet

texts.en:
Annet is a hard-working woman. She is 23 years old and lives in the town of Bulenga in the Kampala region of Uganda. She is married and has 3 children with 1 of them currently in school. For the past 2 years, she has been working hard to manage her restaurant, which sells cooked food and soft drinks. 

To help expand her business, Annet has requested a loan of 1,200,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase food items, and will help her to generate greater profits and educate her children. She hopes that in the future she will be able to open up a hardware shop. 

Annet is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to purchase food items.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is a hardworking woman. Joyce is 23 years old and lives in the town of Bulenga in the Kampala region of Uganda. She is married and has one child who is currently in school. For the past 1 year, Joyce has been working hard to manage her fish vending business, which deals in selling fish. 

To help expand her business, Joyce has requested a loan of 700,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more fish, and will help Joyce to generate greater profits and improve business. Joyce hopes that in the future she will be able to buy a plot of land. 

Joyce is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: buy fish

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a hardworking woman. Mariam is 18 years old and lives in the town of Kyengera in the Kampala region of Uganda. She has no children. For the past 2 years, Mariam has been working hard to manage her retail shop, which sells sugar, salt, posho, rice, flour. 

To help expand her business, Mariam has requested a loan of 300,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more sugar, salt, posho, rice, flour, and will help Mariam to generate greater profits and improve business. Mariam hopes that in the future she will be able to become a business woman. 

Mariam is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Isabel Esperanza

texts.es: Isabel tiene 65 años de edad, vive en junto a sus cinco hijos todos mayores de edad e independizados cada uno del otro.
